Record Class PosterConfig.ProtocolConfig

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
ca.gc.cra.radar.config.PosterConfig.ProtocolConfig
Record Components:
inputDirectory - directory supplying message pairs when using file IO
kafkaInputTopic - Kafka topic supplying message pairs when using Kafka IO
outputDirectory - directory for poster outputs when writing to the file system
kafkaOutputTopic - Kafka topic for rendered posters when using Kafka outputs
Enclosing class:
PosterConfig
public static record PosterConfig.ProtocolConfig(Optional<Path> inputDirectory, Optional<String> kafkaInputTopic, Optional<Path> outputDirectory, Optional<String> kafkaOutputTopic) extends Record
Per-protocol poster configuration covering file and Kafka targets.
Since:
RADAR 0.1-doc

    • equals

      public final boolean equals(Object o)
      Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. All components in this record class are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object).
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
